segment.source: While we continue to recommend that you digitally sign your package, we’ve removed all of the functionality that allowed you to add a root certificate using the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11.
segment.target: While we continue to recommend that you digitally sign your package, we’ve removed all of the functionality that allowed you to add a root certificate using the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11.

segment.source: The wizard page itself will be removed in a future version of the IEAK.
segment.target: The wizard page itself will be removed in a future version of the IEAK.

segment.source: Use the Add a Root Certificate page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Add a Root Certificate page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Add a Root Certificate page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Add a Root Certificate page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: While we continue to recommend that you digitally sign your package, we’ve removed all of the functionality that allowed you to add a root certificate using the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11.

segment.source: Click Next to go to the Programs page or Back to go to the Security and Privacy Settings page.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the Programs page or Back to go to the Security and Privacy Settings page.
